bibl.title: The Cavalry Settlers of the Herakleopolite in the First Century.
bibl.note: Version originale: Les cavaliers catoeques de l'Héracléopolite au Ier siècle, Egypt and the Hellenistic World = Studia Hellenistica. 27 (Lovanii, 1983) pp. 1-11.
BINGEN Jean, The Cavalry Settlers of the Herakleopolite in the First Century.
Jean BINGEN, Hellenistic Egypt. Monarchy, Society, Economy, Culture. Edited with an Introduction by Roger S. BAGNALL (Edinburgh, 2007) pp. 132-140.
